amendment.description: Amendment requires the Federal Open Market Committee to use fully revised data rather than the initial readings that are first available.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 114-341 to require FOMC to use fully revised data rather than the initial readings that are first available.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heck (WA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Heck (WA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Heck (WA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
